TopicTitle: How do i put a link in my post?

Articles.Content: I want to let people download one of my planes, but i cant figure out how to Put in a download link:mad:
Just copy-paste the URL into your text and the forum will automatically convert it to a link. If it doesn't you could add *http://* in front of it and try again.

i meant how do i insert a file into a post
You have to upload it to a file hosting site. I prefer dropbox, but mediafire, mega or google drive are options, too. Then you get the url and insert it into your post.
